subtitleNullable: All URLs and "lastmod" tags from the Bloomberg Business XML Sitemap
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Getting content insights from XML sitemaps can reveal a lot of information on the publishing trends of a certain website, as well as the content they write about.


### Content

All URLs of the business articles published by Bloomberg.com, retrieved from https://www.bloomberg.com/feeds/bbiz/sitemap_index.xml


### Acknowledgements

Bloomberg.com, Python

### Inspiration

Although they contain minimal information, sitemaps can potentially reveal interesting insights, so I thought it can be interesting to formalize the process.
